author: Slobrojoe
title: An excellent Chima add-on
review:
This set was released with a magazine in May and July 2015. And will be reasonably hard to find now.

Box/Instructions

This set was released in a poly bag. It contained no instructions as they were included in the magazine.

Minifigs

There were no minifigs.

Parts

This includes some really nice translucent blue and red parts to represent Fire and Ice weapons as shown in the TV program.

Build

To build the model it requires some fishing around in the magazine. When you find them, the build is quite simple. It teaches different methods to make weapons using cool pieces.

Pros: 

-Really nice fire and ice pieces

-Can fit any Chima character

-Has a variety of weapon sizes

Cons:

-Exclusive to May-June 2015

-No minifig

Overall, this is a very handy set to have if you need to arm troops for battle. However, this set was exclusive and now not many people own it and it goes for high prices. The Lego Chima range was supposed to take over Ninjago but ended off shelves and is now no longer available in shops.
